title: Queens Halloween Photography with David Ayllon
summary: In this Learn Plus episode preview, photographer Lindsay Adler and guest expert David Ayllon discuss creating spooky, playful, and glamorous Halloween drag photography using DIY techniques and creative lighting.

steps.action: Introduction to the episode theme: Spooky Halloween Drag photography.
David Ayllon describes the style of the shoot as spooky, gay, and a little bit stupid.
Demonstration of DIY techniques and various lighting setups including gels and modifiers.
Explanation of the final goal: creating eye-catching, playful, and glamorous interpretations of drag.

key_takeaways: Incorporate DIY techniques and creative lighting to enhance drag photography.
Blend spooky themes with glamour and humor for unique results.
Experiment with different interpretations of drag characters.
